title: My computer keeps freezing on the main menu!!!
body: So basically i can launch and log in perfectly fine but as soon as i get to the main menu (where it says play up the top) my whole computer freeze and im forced to restart it. everything was working perfectly fine yesterday the only thing thats different is that my computer did an automatic windows update so maybe that had something to do with it? either way riot can you please at least confirm you're working on fixing this because apparently its been happening to a lot of people but i havent seen any response from you guys yet

replies.body:
What happens if you try running other programs? Does your computer freeze in a similar fashion?

Also, what OS are you running?
Nothing else caused it to freeze (its stopped doing it now even though i havent changed anything and i use windows 8.1 i think

>i think

https://delightcircle.files.wordpress.com/2015/02/wpid-wp-1425042279087.jpeg

I was thinking it might have been the automatic scans and other 'maintenance' things that Windows does without alerting you at all. Might want to disable those things to save this from happening in the future. It's suggested you do so especially if you have an anti-virus already installed.
Has this solved your issue? Do you still freeze when it opens?
